text: Target Corporation is a company with a chain of discount department stores in the United States. George Dayton started the company in 1902. It is based in Minneapolis, Minnesota. Target has 1,956 storeshttps://corporate.target.com/about/locations in the United States. They operated in Canada from 2013 to 2015. Target's main competitors are Amazon, Walmart, and formerly Kmart. Target stores are more upscale and have higher quality products than other discount stores. Targets are also located in more cities and urban centers while Walmart stores are mainly in rural areas and suburbs. ==Products== *Groceries *Men's, Women's, and Children's clothing *Baby products *Home essentials *Furniture *Toys and video games *Beauty products *Electronics *Movies, music, and books *Health and pharmacy *Kitchen and dining ==Related pages== * Target Canada ==References== Category:1900s establishments in Minnesota Category:1902 establishments in the United States
title: Target Corporation
